title: Danganronpa Kirigiri - Novel Updates
author: Takekuni Kitayama
description:
Danganronpa Kirigiri (ダンガンロンパ霧切) is a side novel written by Takekuni Kitayama which focuses on Kyoko Kirigiri and her past with Yui Samidare.

The novel was released on September 13, 2013 and was published by Seikaisha along with illustrations by Rui Komatsuzaki. >
